content:
Hello All:
There is a doodle poll to determine the next and ongoing meeting time that has been sent to a list of folks indicating interest in this subgroup activities. If you are interested in this group and did not receive this eMail, please message me @Davera Gabriel and indicate your availability for next week and ongoing meetings by responding to the following doodle poll:
https://doodle.com/poll/fe9ekii7tbig7cid?utm_source=poll&utm_medium=link
Happy to answer any other questions you may have as well
Cheers,
Davera

Hello All:
The results of the doodle poll has us meeting on Monday, 2-3p Eastern. There are a couple of respondents to the poll for whom I do not have eMail addresses - so please message me with your eMail address if you did not receive an invitation, but would like one.
Cheers
Davera
